DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial measure surgical site infection rate function time wound dress removal .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Timing Removal Wound Dressing Surgical Site Infection Rate After Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial sample size 602 patient study effect time wound dress removal surgical site infection rate . 300 patient randomize group wind dress remove 12-30 hour postoperatively . 302 patient randomize group wind dress removal 30-48 hour postoperatively . Statistical analysis perform determine timing dress removal statistical significance surgical site infection rate , primary outcome .
DOC.criteria: patient age 1850 year ; medically competent ( proxy prisoner ) ; multifetal singleton gestation 23 0/7 week 42 0/7 week gestational age . Inability obtain informed consent ; fetal death ; immunocompromised patient ; patient take immunosuppressant ; history document surgical site infection ; patient require reoperation within 6 week postoperative period indication wound dehiscence/debridement/infection .
